remarks:
Split a biconditional and distribute two quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2005.) 

---

 Split a biconditional and distribute 2 quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2005.)
statement: 2albiim $p |- ( A. x A. y ( ph <-> ps ) <-> ( A. x A. y ( ph -> ps ) /\ A. x A. y ( ps -> ph ) ) ) $.
